title: CuInS2 quantum dots-based unipolar resistive switching for non-volatile memory applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14910-14918
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01087F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Harshit Sharma, Nitish Saini, Lalita, Divya Kaushik, Ajeet Kumar, Ritu Srivastava
CuInS2 QDs are employed as a functional layer in a memristive device with an Al/CuInS2/ITO configuration featuring unipolar resistive switching behavior with high on/off ratio and excellent reproducibility.
